description:
Gear up the weather protection when the weather goes downhill. These Blaze shoe covers give you stretchy water-resistant protection from all the wet weather grime that comes with fall and winter riding. With reflective details and a reflective offset zipper, you’ll shine bright when the light goes out.

  • PU coated LYCRA® uppers give you protection against the elements
  • Stretchy LYCRA® conforms to your shoe for a streamlined fit
  • Long zipper and heel tab make for an easy on/off, so you can spend more time riding
  • Reflective details help keep you visible when lights get low
name: Giro Blaze Shoe Cover - Unisex
